description: For tablet users on the go, Verbatim’s Ultra-Slim Bluetooth Keyboard offers a stylish, thin design for the utmost in mobility. Designed to work with your iPad, iPad 2, and iPhone, along with other Bluetooth-enabled Tablets (with HID keyboard support), this keyboard features an ultra-compact design that readily fits into the included carrying case for exceptional portability and easy storage. The keyboard features enhanced, easy-to-use smart keys for cut, copy, paste and undo, with added controls for music, power off and device locking.* The Ultra-Slim keyboard also eliminates the need for constant battery changing with its built-in rechargeable power source that is easily replenished via a USB-to-computer or wall-charger connection.
title: Verbatim Ultra-Slim Rechargable Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard for iPhone, iPad (All), iPodTouch, Kindle Fire HD (All), Google Nexus, Samsung Galaxy, other Android Tablets, Black 97753
